CustomField.description: This field converts Self-Service feedback values to Positive, Negative or Neutral
CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT( NS_Self_Service_Tools_are_easy_to_use__c ), "Strongly Disagree","Negative", "Somewhat Disagree","Negative", "Somewhat Agree","Positive", "Strongly Agree","Positive", "N/A" )
CustomField.label: Self-Service Feedback Formula
